title: font help
content:
hi  
can you please tell me the names( or similar other font names) that look like that fonts.  
thank you really much for the help
author: chihiro

comments.content: Can't identify what we can't see.

Gotham, Verdana, Super Duty, Georgia.

[Sorry, couldn’t resist]
I think this is the font called 'Bob' again.

<cite>I think this is the font called ’Bob’ again.</cite>

Damn, I _neeeeed_ that one. So incredibly economic, even better than [FF Mt](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824171039/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32737)!

_incredibly economic, even better than FF Mt_
